mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.hold_id AS "holdId", a.hold_type AS "holdType", a.owner_code AS "ownerCode", a.sku_code AS "skuCode", a.lot_num AS "lotNum", a.loc_code AS "locCode", a.trace_id AS "traceId", a.reason_code AS "reasonCode", a.reason AS "reason", a.is_allow_mv AS "isAllowMv", a.is_allow_ad AS "isAllowAd", a.is_allow_tf AS "isAllowTf", a.hold_op AS "holdOp", a.hold_time AS "holdTime", a.rec_ver AS "recVer", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.org_id AS "orgId"
LEFT JOIN sys_office so on a.org_id = so.id LEFT JOIN sys_user creater on creater.id = a.create_by LEFT JOIN sys_user updater on updater.id = a.update_by
mapper.select:
SELECT , ebc.ebcu_name_cn AS ownerName, cws.sku_name AS skuName FROM wm_hold a LEFT JOIN eb_customer ebc ON a.owner_code = ebc.ebcu_customer_no AND a.org_id = ebc.org_id AND ebc.ebcu_type LIKE concat('%OWNER,%') LEFT JOIN cd_wh_sku cws ON a.owner_code = cws.owner_code AND a.sku_code = cws.sku_code AND a.org_id = cws.org_id
WHERE a.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wm_hold( id, hold_id, hold_type, owner_code, sku_code, lot_num, loc_code, trace_id, reason_code, reason, is_allow_mv, is_allow_ad, is_allow_tf, hold_op, hold_time, rec_ver, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag, org_id ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{holdId}, #{holdType}, #{ownerCode}, #{skuCode}, #{lotNum}, #{locCode}, #{traceId}, #{reasonCode}, #{reason}, #{isAllowMv}, #{isAllowAd}, #{isAllowTf}, #{holdOp}, #{holdTime}, #{recVer}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{orgId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE wm_hold SET hold_id = #{holdId}, hold_type = #{holdType}, owner_code = #{ownerCode}, sku_code = #{skuCode}, lot_num = #{lotNum}, loc_code = #{locCode}, trace_id = #{traceId}, reason_code = #{reasonCode}, reason = #{reason}, is_allow_mv = #{isAllowMv}, is_allow_ad = #{isAllowAd}, is_allow_tf = #{isAllowTf}, hold_op = #{holdOp}, hold_time = #{holdTime}, rec_ver = #{recVer} + 1, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id} AND rec_ver = #{recVer}
